casebody.data:
No. 10-7184. Melvin Keith Richardson, Petitioner v. David A. Varano, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Coal Township, et al. 562 U.S. 1147, 131 S. Ct. 924,

178 L. Ed. 2d 770,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 417, January 10, 2011.

Petition for writ of

certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
